origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'CreditScore.get_loan_requirements', 'description': 'Get the credit score requirements for personal loans', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'requirements', 'description': 'the credit score requirements for personal loans'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我正在考虑申请个人贷款，但我对信用评分的要求不太清楚。首先，我需要了解个人贷款的信用评分标准。接着，我想分析不同信用评分对贷款审批的影响。然后，我希望得到一些提高信用评分的建议。最后，我想查询我当前的信用评分。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取个人贷款的信用评分标准
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数是什么?
{'requirements': 'For personal loans, a credit score of 650 or higher is generally required for approval. Scores below 650 may result in higher interest rates or denial of the loan application.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'requirements': 'For personal loans, a credit score of 650 or higher is generally required for approval. Scores below 650 may result in higher interest rates or denial of the loan application.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析不同信用评分对贷款审批的影响
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数是什么?

{'impact': 'A credit score above 700 typically results in better interest rates and more favorable loan terms. Scores between 650 and 700 may still be approved but with higher interest rates. Scores below 650 are less likely to be approved and may require additional collateral or a co-signer.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'impact': 'A credit score above 700 typically results in better interest rates and more favorable loan terms. Scores between 650 and 700 may still be approved but with higher interest rates. Scores below 650 are less likely to be approved and may require additional collateral or a co-signer.'}
